name: Grab Machine
description:
Controls

  • Tab: add more toys
  • Space: grab those toys
  • Arrow Keys: move towards the toys, or maybe away from the toys

Everyone's favourite and least disappointing game is here in digital form! Control the claw to grab your toy and bring it towards the collection bin.

 (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ a game by Raphaël Tétreault and Katherine Elliott

* We have a few polish things to do still so standby for an update later this week (hopefully)
